{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Huawei |model=WS5200 |revision=v1 |series=AC1200 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=wireless router |fcc_date=04/27/2018 |fcc_id=QISWS5200 |pcb_id=AM1WS5200M |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197FS |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX35LF1GE4AB-Z4IH |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Realtek |ram1_model=RTL8197FS |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8197FS |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8812BRH |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367RB |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=HUAWEI-XXXXXX |default_ip=192.168.3.1 |oui=10:44:00 |oui_eth=10:44:00 }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|1200Mbps Wireless Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://consumer.huawei.com/en/smart-home/ws5200/}} "AM1WS5200M VER.B HF" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. [[Realtek]] Chip IDs are not visible in the FCC photos. :"A new generation of 28-nanometer main chip" Based on the 1GHz and 28nm specs claimed by [[Huawei]] along with the fact that this device
contains a large [[Realtek]] GbE switch chip this device likely uses a RTL8197FS + RTL8812BRH. ===Models=== *[[Huawei WS5200]] - AC1200 • [https://www.acwifi.net/6019.html Teardown on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN) :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8197FS/RTL8812BRH/RTL8367RB :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX35LF1GE4AB-Z4IH (128MB NAND) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/QISWS5200 QISWS5200] (2018-05-11) • AC1200 *[[Huawei WS5200 v2]] - AC1200 • [https://www.acwifi.net/6720.html '''AC|WiFi'''] • [https://www.acwifi.net/8182.html '''AC|WiFi'''] :CPU: [[HiSilicon]] Hi5651H @800MHz (Dual-core ARM) :CPU: [[HiSilicon]] Hi5651T @1GHz (Quad-core ARM) :Flash/RAM: 16MB/128MB ([[Winbond]]), 12V/1A :WLAN: 2x [[HiSilicon]] Hi1151 (2x 2T2R) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/QISWS5200V2 QISWS5200V2] (2019-11-12) __NOTOC__
